issue.title: www.chewy.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://www.chewy.com/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2F) ### Comment > Searching on the website doesn't work. > > 1. Attempt to type in search box. No drop-down occurs > 2. Hitting enter or clicking the search button reloads the page. > 3. No search results. ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/fydqilr277k000o0w8ckogwck8so8gcmcc4af5ms74.png?nc=1)
Screenshot 1 with AdGuard disabled ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguard.info/sitereports/ro196qpo6fk80cksggkw00o8448c0ocmu6roiz0eu8.png?nc=1)

Block trackers,
Strip URLs from tracking parameters,
Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header

**Tracking methods**:
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180)

**Windows tracking**:
Disable Windows Telemetry,
Turn off Advertising ID

**Miscellaneous**:
Hide your Referrer from third-parties,
Hide your User-Agent,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,

filters: `1.15`, `User rules (url: none)` Filters: | Ad blocking:

BitWarden and Adguard VPN are installed. ### Issue configuration [Import](https://reports.adguard.com/settings/import.html?adblocking.enabled=true&browsing_security.enabled=true&browsing_security.statistics_enabled=false&custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.custom_bootstrap=&dns.custom_fallback=&dns.custom_filters=User%2520rules%2520%28url%3A%2520none%29&dns.enabled=true&dns.fallback_mode=System&dns.filters=1.15&dns.servers=https%3A%2F%2Fdns.adguard-dns.com%2Fdns-query&dns.timeout=0&extensions=AdGuard%2520Extra%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fadguard-extra%2F1.0%2Fadguard-extra.user.js%29%2CAdGuard%2520Popup%2520Blocker%2520%28script%3B%2520url%3A%2520https%3A%2F%2Fuserscripts.adtidy.org%2Frelease%2Fpopup-blocker%2F2.5%2Fpopupblocker.user.js%29&extensions.enabled=true&filters=2.3.17.18.19.21&license_type=paid&product_type=Win&product_version=7.20.2+%284988%29&referrer=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.chewy.com%2F&scheme_version=2&stealth.DNT=true&stealth.block_third_party_auth=false&stealth.block_trackers=true&stealth.disable_third_party_cache=false&stealth.disable_wap_push_message_routing_service=false&stealth.disable_windows_defender=false&stealth.disable_windows_telemetry=true&stealth.dpi=true&stealth.enabled=true&stealth.flash=false&stealth.hide_search_queries=true&stealth.java=false&stealth.location=false&stealth.push=false&stealth.strip_url=true&stealth.third_party_cookies=180&stealth.turn_off_advertising_id=true&stealth.webrtc=false&stealth.x_client=true&system_version=Microsoft+Windows+NT+10.0.26100.0&user_agent=Mozilla%2F5.0+%28Windows+NT+10.0%3B+Win64%3B+x64%3B+rv%3A137.0%29+Gecko%2F20100101+Firefox%2F137.0&win.wfp=true)
